transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Good evening. Nikhil ji baat kar rahe hain?

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Good evening. Nikhil ji baat kar rahe hain sir?

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Ji Amit baat kar raha hu sir IndiaMART se aapka account manager.

Executive: Aapne sir ek request kiya tha like video meet ke regarding aapko kuch cheeze just samajhni hain.

Customer: Main to sir kab se koshish kar raha hu manager sahab se baat karne ko baat hi nahi ho pa rahi kya karu.

Executive: Achcha achcha. Abhi abhi aapke paas samay hai sir?

Executive: Mujhe bataiye agar abhi aapke paas samay hai to main abhi aapke saath video meet kar leta hu aur cheeze aapko samjhne mein ban sake.

Customer: Pehle ki baat kar raha hai yaar.

Executive: Haan ji Amit baat kar raha hu main.

Customer: Achcha pehle kya tha isliye theek hai na aap mera connect kijiye na mere ko kya hai bahut cheeze samajhni hai bahut dikkat ja rahi hai.

Executive: Achcha. To abhi aapke paas laptop hai sir available?

Customer: Haan main laptop pe connected hu.

Executive: Laptop se connected hai. Theek hai na abhi sir aapko video link bhejta hu na theek then aap connect ho jayiye hai na.

Customer: Bhejiye bhejiye.

Executive: Call pe rahiye main bhejta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to connect with manager.

- Needs help understanding several things.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meet to assist.

- Agreed to send a video link for connection.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send video link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, account, manager, connection
